location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 575 of 1866 from Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay Castle to Lieutenant-Colonel Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Brief letter acknowledging receipt of a telegram from Pelly concerning the receipt of a letter from the Wahabee Ameer [Wahhabi Amir] and requesting a full report to include the full details of the Ameer's [Amir] letter and suggestions for further courses of actions be submitted to Government.
